snippet: The rating service dropped the commonwealth’s debt to a notch above junk status, pressuring the new governor to head off an economic crisis.
abstract: Moody's Investor Service downgrades debt of Puerto Rico to just above junk status, putting pressure on governor-elect Alejandro Garcia-Padilla to show credible plans for staving off a crisis.
lead_paragraph: The rating service dropped the commonwealth’s debt to a notch above junk status, pressuring the new governor to head off an economic crisis.

headline.main: Moody’s Downgrade Deepens Puerto Rico’s Economic Problems
headline.print_headline: Moody’s Downgrade Deepens Puerto Rico’s Economic Problems

keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
